Description: THE PROJECT SEEKS TO TRAIN 54 PROFESSIONALS OF THE COURT AND PENITENTIARY SYSTEM, PUBLIC PROSECUTORS OFFICE, AND PUBLIC DEFENDERS 18 LAWYERS, 18 PSYCHOLOGISTS AND 18 SOCIAL WORKERS NATIONWIDE THROUGH THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE MTT

SUPPORT GOVERNMENT  TRANSPARENCY AND ACCOUNTABILITY BY DEVELOPING A ROADMAP TO DISSEMINATE INFORMATION TO THE PUBLIC, TRAIN GOVERNMENT USERS, RAISE AWARENESS AND SUPPORT USE AMONG CSOS AND THE PUBLIC OF THE ANTAI PLATFORM

IMPLEMENT A PROGRAM COMPOSED OF ACTIVITIES  TO 1) DEVELOP AND PUBLISH BUDGET DOCUMENTS CITIZENS CAN UNDERSTAND 2)EXPOSE THE MEDIA, CSOS AND THE PUBLIC TO BUDGET CONCEPTS TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE BUDGET 3) BUILD CSO CAPACITY FOR BUDGET ADVOCACY
RAISE AWARENESS ABOUT OPEN PARLIAMENT PRINCIPLES AMONG PANAMA'S NATIONAL ASSEMBLY WHILE PROMOTING CITIZEN ENGAGEMENT IN PARLIAMENTARY ACTIVITIES.
TO IMPROVE PUBLIC CONTRACT LAW COMPLIANCE AMONG PANAMANIAN GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS AND STRENGTHEN CSOS AND PRIVATE SECTOR ABILITY TO OVERSEE AND ADVOCATE FOR ADEQUATE PUBLIC CONTRACTING LAW COMPLIANCE.
STRENGTHEN PANAMA'S CIVIL SERVICE, CIVIL SOCIETY AND GOVERNMENT PLANNING TO IMPROVE ENVIRONMENTAL SUSTAINABILITY, SOCIOECONOMIC GROWTH AND INTEGRAL COAST DEVELOPMENT.
OVERALL GOAL OF THE PROGRAM IS TO PROMOTE GREATER TRANSPARENCY AND ANTI-CORRUPTION IN PANAMA THROUGH BUDGET TRANSPARENCY AND CITIZEN PARTICIPATION.
REINFORCE OPEN-DATA COMMUNITY BEING CULTIVATED BY PLANTING AN INSTITUTION DEDICATED TO SUPPORTING INVESTIGATIVE JOURNALISM AGAINST CORRUPTION.
YFP WILL REACH, PREPARE, DEPLOY AND SUPPORT LEADERSHIP TEAMS OF PANAMANIAN YOUNG PEOPLE.
TO DEVELOP & IMPLEMENT THE NEW ADVOCATES TRAINING COURSE ON WRITTEN & ORAL LITIGATION SKILLS IN CRIMINAL PROCEDURES IN THE ACCUSATORY JUSTICE SYSTEM
TO INTRODUCE A NEW ELEMENT OF ACCOUNTABILITY AND AWARENESS TO MONITOR AND ASSESS PERFORMANCE OF MEMBERS OF PANAMA'S NATIONAL ASSEMBLY.
TO STRENGTHEN AND EDUCATE THE JUDICIAL BODY IN ALTERNATIVE MEASURES FOR INMATES IN THE LA JOYA PENITENTIARY CENTER.
RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CIVIL SERVICE CAPACITY WITHIN PANAMA'S NEWLY ELECTED NATIONAL ASSEMBLY.
STRENGTHEN PANAMANIAN CSO MANAGERIAL. FINANCIAL AND ADVOCACY CAPACITIES TO IMPROVE SUSTAINABILITY

PROMOTE THE USE OF BEST PRACTICES FOR THE ONLINE PUBLICATION AND THE CREATION OF SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC VALUE FROM PUBLIC DATA
FOSTER A COMMUNITY OF OPEN DATA LEADERS WHO WILL ENGAGE CITIZENS IN A MOVEMENT TO INCREASE TRANSPARENCY AND ACCOUNTABILITY.

THIS WORKSHOP WILL CONVENE TECHNICAL AND POLICY EXPERTS TO IDENTIFY AND PRIORITIZE RESEARCH PROTOCOLS TO IMPROVE MANAGEMENT OF INFECTIOUS DISEASES.
